name: iContact
description: Add an iContact instance to connect your existing iContact account to the Marketing Hub, allowing you to manage campaigns, lists, contacts etc. across multiple Marketing Elements. You will need your iContact account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: API-Password
configuration.description: The API application password set when the application was registered. This API password is used as input when your application authenticates to the API. This password is not the same as the password you use to log in to iContact.

configuration.name: API-Username
configuration.description: The iContact username for logging into your iContact account.

configuration.name: AppId
configuration.description: This AppId is used to uniquely identify your application. It is obtained when API application is registered.

configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
configuration.description: Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.name: Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication
configuration.description: Icontact Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication

configuration.name: Event poller refresh interval
configuration.description: Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

configuration.name: Event Poller Resources Configuration
configuration.description: Event Poller Resources Configuration. The configuration is defined via JSON, an example of which is as follows - { "contacts": { "url": "/hubs/helpdesk/contacts", “idField”: “user.id”, “datesConfiguration”: { "updatedDateField": "user.updated_at", "updatedDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX", “createdDateField”: “user.created_at”, “createdDateFormat": "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX" }, "pageSize": 10000 } }

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results in a page. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be returned. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates the subscription status of the contact. Proper values include total, normal, donotcontact, bounced, pending, invitable, deleted.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For example, createDate >= '2017-06-29'.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be returned. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results in a page. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

resources.description: Create a new contact. If a contact already exists with the given email, it will be updated instead of creating a new one.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The contact object. Status can only be changed to donotcontact or normal when updating a contact. You cannot change a contact’s status if that status is donotcontact, pending, or invitable.

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. For example, name = 'Cloud'.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be returned. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results in a page. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be returned. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results in a page. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results in a page. Defaults to 200 if not provided. Maximum of 2000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies which page should be returned. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The campaign objects. You should provide 'campainId' in the individual objects in order to make successful call.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The contact objects. Status can only be changed to donotcontact or normal when updating a contact. You cannot change a contact’s status if that status is donotcontact, pending, or invitable.  You should provide 'contactId' in the individual objects in order to make successful call.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The list objects. You should provide 'listId' in the individual objects in order to make successful call.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The message objects. You should provide 'messageId' in the individual objects in order to make successful call.
